info.name: Simple Tilezilla 2.0
info.description:
This theme has significant different from the previous one, so I decided to keep them separated.
This is a very clean and minimalistic theme for those that like to keep it simple but not bland. The tabs are quite spacious, thus this theme works better in fullHD screens or bigger.
info.additionalInfo:
This style works best with "Hide Caption Titlebar" addon [1] and with the Developer edition of Firefox.

[1] https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/hide-caption-titlebar-plus-sma/
